content.detailedDescription: An associate and i were sitting in front of my house in a suburban area of hanover, pa. as we talked, we both witnessed what appeared to be a flaming piece of debris fall from the sky to some fields just outside of hanover. she claims it was a greenish color, while i saw it as being a yellow. we didn't see its exact landing site, but we were curious as to what it was. we could see a slight smoke trail left behind by it for a few minutes after, but we couldn't quite make out exactly where it landed. we never found an impact site, nor did we even hear it land, but for about an hour afterwards, we saw several planes and helicopters apparently circling the area it landed at. we put off reporting it for a week or so, to see if anything was in the news, but nothing was said. we haven't found anyone else who reported seeing it, nor have we been contacted by any news stations we asked.
content.summary: Hanover

content.detailedDescription: Didn't see any object's just was taking photo's and video and have proof of alien visitation's and actual real being's and they are as real as you are after you pinched yourself !!! so the next time someone say's your crazy and tell you it's a lie..When they come and excavate our earth for it's natural resourses...Then i can say that i warned you all and it isn't on my conscience any more...Mr.[name removeed/cms/tg] blog showing all the ufo's that i have seen and have confermed with expert's and are taking us in our sleep..Doesn't it consern other's that we are being taken and experimented on and are being dropped back into our bed's after the confrontation..And why is the government staying quiet?? because other's and i, are right and, "the government", can't stop them. can prove (proof of alien's) with close up video's of alien life and the government does have an alien and they are very short due to the gravity on their planet'(s)..Yes they are more than one alien planet's inhabitable in other area's of the universe and we have the technology to prove it and go there to their planet. but the government won't disclose that information.."national security......."bull****!"" so full of **** the might as well wear rubber wader's, it is so deep in lies and bull****..I even doubt that even the government itself hasn't been reconformed in so long that it is one big siv leaking lies and the truth...What need's to be done. that won't be done...Because they are too very cautous..And go by the ever lost book called the constitution.Which never get's updated with "cleaning up the government." the alien's don't need a book to go by..They are well equipped to wipe us off the face of the earth and still have the earth for resourses..The government is just too old and we need to update our government and get rid of the people that want to throw wrenches into the search for extrterestrial life. just throw them under the bus, instead and then you can have a happy forever..By putting people that care about other people and not just for the man itself !!
content.summary: Object was not visible with naked eye..Show's up in photo's and video's

content.detailedDescription:
As i was driving southward over a familiar road in a rural area (known locally as the "royal road" just northwest of fredericton, new brunswick, canada)in the community called tay creek, i saw, just above the horizon in front of me, hovering at approximately 1000 feet, something that was either several objects or one object with serveral attached orbs. the main body of the object was chevron-shaped, and there was a single orb above the chevron attached by a short column. there were several other orbs, but i couldn't tell if they were attached or detached because of the brief nature of my sighting - only 30 seconds, to the best of my recollection.

the objects were completely still, and they seemed to be made from a dull, silver metal (like pewter) that glowed or radiated light. all parts of the object, or all of the objects were radiating a silver-white light that illuminated the space around them to, once again, approximately 1000 feet in every direction.

in my perception, the spheres appeared to be approximately the size of small cars, eg. volkswagon beetles; the chevron component the size of say, a leer jet; and the column the connected the chevron to the top sphere about the size of a telephone booth.

all objects, taken as a whole, covered an area of approximately 500 yards in a roughly circular configuration.

when i first saw the sight, i struggled to understand what i was seeing - my mind wanted to create the image of a helicopter or something else familiar to me. so, when i finally realized i was looking at something quite fantastic, i had only a few seconds to grasp the details.

i was descending down a steep slope into a small valley as i drove along, and quickly lost sight of the objects. when i drove up out of the valley and ascended the ridge, the sky was completely empty; there was no air traffic of any sort, no hovering objects, nothing!  

it was a brief encounter, but the event was utterly convincing. i don't know exactly what i saw, but i know i have never seen anything even remotely similar. anything that could appear and disappear that quickly - and be that large - was clearly and undoubtedly not fabricated by human hands.

(post script - your drop-down menu with regard to time zones was a little complex for me, so i'll leave you with this - the event took place at approximately 7:10 pm, atlantic standard time, on monday, march 14th)
content.summary: Still object (s) hovering at approximately 1000 feet above ground in a remote rural area.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along bruce b downs blvd on my way to work and the day featured a clear, bright blue sky, with absolutely no clouds. i kinda saw something in my peripheral vision and i looked up. there was what looked like a triangle with a curved base (teardrop shape) made up of a bunch of white dots. i initially thought it was a flock of birds flying together really high at first. after a second or two, all of the dots faded out simultaneously and disappeared completely from sight. i looked all around and couldn't see the formation anywhere. i assumed that maybe there were high fog-like clouds that i couldn't see that maybe obscured the formation. then slowly, the dots appeared again slowly and simultaneously like a fade-in and i tried to squint and see it better. it definitely wasn't birds and wasn't really moving from it's position at all either, so it wasn't a plane. then it faded away again until it was completely gone. after a second or two, it came back and i tried to look around and see if it was attached to something and couldn't find a source. it faded in and out about 3 more times. then, i got a shock. i literally gasped and shouted "no freaking way!". i swear to god, a line just above the curved base blinked one dot at a time and it looked like that particular lower section moved in a counterclockwise motion with the blinking dots. then the entire thing faded away and completely disappeared again. i never saw it again after that no matter how hard i looked.
content.summary: Unexplained phenomenom seen in the sky above new tampa

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my two roommates were in front of my apartment building talking when i decided to lay on my back along a garden wall and look up at the sky while my friends carried on the conversation. i immediately noticed the big dipper, it being one of the few constellations i can recognize. as i was looking up, two dim orange-red lights appeared overhead and began travelling at a tremendous speed in a northerly direction. they traversed the entire span of the sky in only a few seconds. the lights traveled parallel to one another, varying the distance between them in a rhythmic, repeating cycle. they appeared directly overhead in the constellation of the big dipper at approximately 11:20 pm (pst) on tuesday march 15, 2011. they moved north quickly and steadily, fading rapidly in and out of view, and they bobbed toward each other as described above. before i could get my roommates to look up, the lights disappeared behind a tree and were gone.

when i first noticed the object i thought it might be a plane. i thought it immediately unusual that the lights would appear overhead so suddenly after i had already been staring at the sky. the lights were much broader than the lights i'm used to seeing on planes at night, and there was no audible noise. the lights at their furthest distance from one another were a thumb's width apart. at their closest, they were half that distance from each other. the speed of the lights astounded me. they were much slower than any shooting star and much faster than any aircraft i'm used to seeing. after years of service on a naval air station, i'm quite used to the appearance and sound of aircraft at a distance. when i realized the unusual nature of what i was seeing i jumped up, and tried to get my friends to notice. all i could say was "whoa -- whoa -- whoa!" while pointing and jumping. they didn't look up until the lights were out of sight.

all i want are answers. i'll take any plausible explanation. i'm really weirded out by the whole thing. anything moving at that rate was either really close or really fast. the way the lights seemed to fade up and then down suggested to me that they entered and exited the atmosphere in a simple ballistic trajectory -- with the exception of the lights bobbing toward and away from each other. if the lights didn't mirror one another's actions in this weaving motion, i'd be much less perplexed. i was not under the influence of any debilitating substance.
content.summary: Twin lights bob and weave northward above southern california

content.detailedDescription: I pulled to the side of road near mankato.  march 15-2011 at 9:11 pm.  i began filming the following footage.  some of these watchers were stationary but many were "movers."  some of these watchers became blinkers, but most remained in watcher form.  those are the ones on this piece of video.  i saw approx. 20 watchers, and 15-30 blinkers, but it is hard to calculate amounts.  i simply know that they are plentifull.  i posted some of the footage on my youtube channel, [youtube channel name remopved/cms/tg].  this phenomenon appears to be getting quite serious. i stopped filming while the entities were still in view, as my battery went dead.
content.summary: Multiple "watcher" ufo sighting(20)

content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday march 15 , 2011

   on tuesday march 15 , 2011 not approximate time 2300 was driving home from the gym , was on central blvd heading south in brownsville texas  when south of me at the horizon saw to be a bright star , at that point it seem to be flaring up and diminish every other second , was stationary for about 2 min object to be sphere and oval shaped , object after 2 min moved west , what appeared to be couple of inches , object flared up one last time and vanished
i am a medic and im station at the airport and i know what aircraft look like when in the sky or on final approach and the brownsville airport ils approach runs north to south on the eastern part of brownsville 



                                                luis
content.summary: Was stationary for 2 min south of us @ the horizon , object flared up and diminish , then flared up for 2 seconds moved to the right then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
It was sunny afternoon. at around 4:16pm. davao philippines. me and family were on vacation. i was baby sitting my baby girl.I was holding my 6 month old baby girl,when i saw 5 to six white disc objects passing  from the south going to north of where i was standing.We where at my in laws house at that time. i called out to anybody from the house to get the camera quick. my wife said "why?'. i shouted just give me the camera! i thought they are ufo as we are near the airport, those cannot be planes. they are white disc. no sound,no wings, no rotors, no tails.
then my wife niece came out of the house with the camera. a digital ixus 200is. i said go and shoot pictures at them pointing at these white dics. she ask me what are those?. they are going for a cloud.
i said just shoot the pictures first. she was shaking when she took the picture. so i said give me that camera. and i have this pictures taken. she then asked me," are those alien ufos? i said maybe.
 then they disappear when they passed behind the cloud. i was expecting them to come out of the cloud, but they just simple went "in" the cloud. or behind the cloud.
i was happy somebody from my family also saw it. at least we got also a picture. so were not crazy or seeing things.
so im sending the original photo. with the second photo with circles indicating them
content.summary: White disc shaped five or more seen on davao airspace.

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 1975 i was 10 years old and went to the drive in
movies in braintree massachusetts with 2 of my older brothers we were
watching a movie i think it was true grit starring john wayne we noticed people getting out of there cars and looking and pointing up we got out to
see what was going on i remember very clearly seeing a round reddish glowing object floating about 100-150 feet in the air completely silent and still.
it looked about 20-30 feet wide and 5-10 feet thick it was saucer shaped  i was looking for a pole or a pipe that should be holding it up but there was no pole i was amazed at this it seemed to be perfectly positioned to watch the movie we stared at it for about a minute or 2 i looked away a few times to see the other peoples reactions and looking for the pole i thought must be holding it up there and then it was gone we all looked at each other and didnt know what to say we all got back in our cars and continued to watch the movie we went home and told our mother and she laughed and dismissed it and i didnt tell anybody until years later i tell people now and they look at me funny and roll there eyes i am convinced we saw an aien craft from another world there is no doubt these aliens were curious and were interested in the movie i have never seen anything like it before or since except pictures and videos online or in books there were at least 100 people that witnessed this event i wish i wrote down the date time and movie we were watching i didnt realize back then how rare it is to see something like this i often drive by that old drive in off route 128 which is now a logan express bus terminal that goes to logan airport the screen is still standing and i saw it the other day and said to myself i am going tell the story and go public i dont care if peoplelaugh at me i know what i saw and it wasnt an illusion or venus or swamp gas
it was an alien visitation and they are 100% real and the government knows it would create panic so i think its a good idea to cover it up and slowly release this information i would if i was in charge. *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: I had a close encounter of the 1st kind at a drive in movie in the summer of 1975

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were on our way to the store. as i was standing in the drive way i saw something that appeared to be a star but it was a little dimmer than a regular star.(note this is not the first time i have seen this star like object. i have seen it at least 4 times within the last 2 months.) as we leave our subdivision i say " that's the same star i saw the other night and its always in the same spot." as i say that the light goes dim. and then it's completely gone. when my husband looks up its gone. i was like oh my god did you see that? he said no. it was if it herd me..

i contine to look at the spot i had saw the star but it was gone. so as we continue on down the road i se the star reapear and it is fast!! almost as if it were following us i point it out to my family but they say it was a plane but this was no plane. it was fast because we were going at least 60mph.And it was keeping up. we were on hwy 78 at this point in snellvile going twords stone mountain. as i contined to watch the object it kinda looked like a boomerang shape with 2 white  light on either end and in the middle there was what appered to be a red light. on the sides that were streched outlooked like there was a violet strobe light kinda like what you see under a car that has the lights under them. as it past us my husband said it was a plane. but a plane was flying by and the obeject seemed to be alot higher. the plane was slow but the obejust was fast. and it speed up more then disapeared this freaked me out. this is the first time the obeject as ever chased us sort of speak. 

the last time i saw a object like this it was hovering over my house and my daughter and i saw it. it was as if it were watching us. and when i acknowledged that it was there  it disappered.
content.summary: My family and i were on our way to the store. as i was standing in the drive way i saw something that appeared to be a star but it was a little dimmer than a regular star.(note this is not the first time i have seen this star like object. i have seen it a

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my house, trying to look near the sun with my binoculars by using some kind of structure to block out the sun, to see ufo's. i had a surprising result with the naked eye, and read somewhere that you could see them better with binoculars, so i'd try it(well, it does, but it also hurts your eyes aftermath, so i don't recommend doing it). but that is another story.

i found myself some comfortable place to observe, by opening the door and sitting in the corridor. i could adjust when the sun was moving down by simply moving further in the house. but when looking in the binoculars, i saw a black object, oval with the edges kinda flatenned saturn-like. it was very small even in the binoculars and i though it was a bird. but it just hovered there and could only be a ufo. it was completely black, and smooth with no structure protuding from it. it had 3 lights, faint in the daylight, red-orrangish, lighting and turning off at regular intervalls of 5 seconds. imagine 3 beacons, light from left to right, and fade off quickly. the lights were separated from the ufo, there was nothing between them and the ufo. the lights, turned on maybe 4 or 5 times and then stopped, the ufo just hovered there without moving. my arms were tired because of the weight of the binoculars so i put them down for sometime, then looking back up it was still there. then it accelered instantly, at high speed to the south and dissapeared behind the mountains, not enormously high speed like you see in the youtube videos, but still very high speed, it also looked like it was falling down, but still dissapeared behind the mountains which were pretty far away (about 4 km). using horizontal coordinate system the object was about 45��� high when hovering, 0��� being the horizon and 90��� the zenith. i made a drawing as best as i could representing what i saw.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Oval ufo at aubenas

content.detailedDescription: My friend dave and i were heading north on i-95 after some shopping.  we reached the stretch of road between white marsh and fallston and what looked like a plane traveling very far away was slowly creeping it's way from west to east.  then in a blink it moved east at a speed that was so fast that the light disappeared in a line of light in the sky.  i waited about ten seconds and then asked dave if he had seen that and he excitedly said he had.  i had him tell me what he had seen and he confirmed what i saw.  we laughed like a couple of kids in disbelief of something amazing.  the light went right over the atlantic faster than i have seen anything move.
content.summary: Far away. dot of light.  white. (but i'm colorblind)

content.detailedDescription: Sat 2/19, outside to walk dog.  looked over my house rooftop (eastward) and saw an unusual silent brilliantly bright circle of soft white light moving approximately sw to ne.  it seemed quite large, but w/o reference, have no way of knowing how far away it was, nor how high.  it moved in a straight line w/o variation toward texarkana area (my supposition).  there were no blinking lights of any kind, and it's own light never varied in intensity.  no sound whatsoever.  i called for another person to come out immediately to verify what i saw.  she said it's movement, lightness, and silence, reminded her of a balloon, only it was moving in a direct line w/o waver.  it neither grew larger nor smaller as we watched.  it also travelled much faster than a small airplane.  it disappeared after some seconds.  whole sighting took maybe a minute and was over by 6:55pm.  all i could say afterward was "wow!"  did not report to any agency, nor did i hear of any other folks seeing anything, but this is a rural area and wouldn't really expect that.  any suggestions?  we don't know the orbit of the space station, nor how fast it would have gone by, or if that was a possiblity?  also, it was almost a totally cloudless evening, some stars out.  tku
content.summary: Sighting of unknown light

content.detailedDescription: I went outside and saw a silver circle hover above a building. then i saw a cow being sucked up.
content.summary: Silver.

content.detailedDescription: I parked my car and noticed a triangle in the sky. it was large and moved slow. red orbs flew into it and made it larger. it then slowly vanished.
content.summary: Triangle

content.detailedDescription: Im a security guard and i had just gotten off of work. with the rock concert event that was going on it was all dead quite when everybody left. i had just sighned off the clock and was waiting for my dad because my car had broke downin in denton texas and he was my ride home. i was just standing leaning back against a truck wen i look across the street pitch black a big circular object comming  out of no where like a shooting star and disapearing. at fist i thought it was one of those lights that clubs use to shine in  the sky. but it was way too clear, even for me which i didnt have my glasses on and cant see good. it was big but  i couldnt see the color of it do to of it being pitch black. only  the smaller circular lights being bright geenish-blue underneathe it that formed a circle and another one in the middle.I  couldnt beelieve what i just  saw when i asked a lady behind me if she saw it and she said yes, described it  perfectly. later my dad picked me up i didnt talk i was shivering and paranoid about the  whole thing. when i got home i stepped inside into the living room i heard a sound like  the mesquitto sound and it stopped then  i heard a sort of radio wave for a while n stopped. my heart was heating so fast i couldnt sleep all night. i drew a sketch on how it  looked like when then i went on google and searched for ufo's and i  found one so  close to  what i saw except the glowing circles where bigger.
content.summary: Up close being round with bright green/blue smaller circles on the sides and one in the middle

content.detailedDescription: My wife and two children left houston for denver, colorado to spend christmas with my relatives. after driving all day we bought fuel in roswell, new mexico before our final driving segment that day as we had hotel resevations in santa rosa, new mexico. i consulted a map in an effort to lesson the trip by a few miles by deciding to take new mexico state highway 20 instead of proceeding north on highway 285 to vaughn, new mexico. within about 7 minutes of turning on to state highway 20 i noticed a very large bright light in my rear view mirror. i had cleaned my windows at the gas stop in roswell so rear visability was good. i thought nothing of it as i thought it was a car with one light out and the other working light on high beam. i thought it could also be a motorcycle but ruled that out as it was too cold so it seemed unlikely. it was at first about 3/4 of a mile behind me and i paid little to no attention to it until i looked in my rear view mirror again and it was about 300 feet behind me. the intense white light was slightly above road level and appeared to be 4 or 5 times larger than a standard car headlight but much brighter. i then looked at my right side view mirror and saw a round amber colored light approximately 40 to 50 feet off the highway and it seemed to be connected to the main light object. the amber light appeared to have a chris/cross or"tic tac toe" type design in the round shaped light. i asked my wife to turn around and help identify what kind of car or vehicle was behind us but this request scared her as she could tell i was concerned about it. at this time a car was appraching in front of us about one to one and a half miles ahead. i was concerned about this because the white light appeared to be in the oncoming lane as well as our own lane. the light was also angled slightly up at an angle. as i waited for the approaching car to pass us i looked in my left side view mirror and saw the object drift to my left and up at the same time. this frightened me a great deal as i then knew it was not a car but in fact was something that was flying. after the car passed the object was gone. about 4 or 5 minutes later it appeared again about 175 to 200 feet behind our ford arrowstar van and my wife was very afraid. i asked her to open the passanger side widow and take a picture with a small camera we had with us of whatever it was but she refused. she touched my hand and said i felt cold and clamy and sweaty. i was concerned for all of us. my 11 year old son was sleeping in the back of the van and was not feeling well all day and our 7 year old daughter was sleeping as well. as we observed the light behind us for another 5 or 6 minutes it stayed where it was at the same speed that i was going. state highway 20 is quite narrow and has no room to pull over even if i wanted to and i had no intention of doing so. i actually tried to outrun it by increasing my speed to 75 to 80 miles per hour but it stayed right with me. i actually repeated to myself over and over again "we do not want contact-we do not want contact" if they were able to detect my urgent plea through telepothy to leave us alone. in the distance another car approached and as it closed to within a mile the object rose again to my left and as it did i observed 3 smaller white lights on what would be considered the side of the object. as it rose the lights all turned off like when you turn the light off on a swimming pool. sort of a slow dim before they went off completely. the approaching car passed and as it did i noticed it braking in my rear view mirror. it did not stop but it braked and kept going. at this point i was concerned and afraid as i believed we may be seeing something that was not from this world. i eliminated the possibility of it being a helicopter as we  would have heard the motor or rotors as it was so close. we did not see it anymore after that and we proceeded on to our destination in santa rosa after a breif stop in fort sumner for directions to highway 84. we will never forget this incident and thought mufon would find it interesting and should know about it. thanks, *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) houston,texas
content.summary: Bright light followed our vehicle very close on and off for 45 minutes. an amber colored light was off the highway by 50 feet or so but was attached to the object.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cig when i saw what looked like lights coming down alderpoint road. it was around midnite and fog was moving pretty fast and the wind was blowing good too. as it seemed like it was getting closer cause the lights were flashing through the trees, i was waiting to see what it was and all of a sudden i see what looks like a blacked out object with no lights . the back of it looked like a trail of dust or smoke was left behind and it looked like a ciggarette being put out behind it as zoomed at a rate of speed that i barely could keep up with it with my eyes. right after that happened i felt like i was on acid . everything i looked at in the sky was moving . i started to to think to my self "was i dosed by somebody earlier in the day?"or "was i just dosed by that dust that went over me"? while im trying to figure all this out i sat in the driver seat of our suburban all i could think it was how confused i was . i was seeing red tints on all the shadows .  the air started to feel heavy and at some points got so hard to see it was like i was blacking out but not losing consiosness only my sight. i would look up at the sky and just see massive amounts of lights moving . but then again everything was looking a little wavy. this is my first report but i need to report another close sighting involving my son and wife. thank you
content.summary: I felt like i was on acid right after i saw an object fly by 20 ft over head

content.detailedDescription: We were at home and noticed it across the street hovering over the local utilities' sub-station in our neighborhood. it was very clearly seen. when we first saw it, we knew it was a ufo. it quickly moved, all of a sudden, in the speed of a blinking eye. we were all scared, and i have seen a ufo when i was a child. it suddenly vanished with no trail or trace of where it went. later on, about 10 minutes afterward, a friend, who lives 5 miles northwest of us, told us that he saw it over his house.
content.summary: Hovered over local utility sub-station.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving on a road in northern baltimore county when a bright magenta/red light (brightest in center- almost white) caught my eye.  at first sight it seemed close then as we drive closer and it seemed like we were about to drive under it.... it looked like smaller lights were dropping from it. then it got smaller and remained in sight (now almost gray in color) and also seeming much farther in the distance.   we both were very perplexed by this.  it stayed stationary too long to be a flare.   we also don't understand how it seemed so close one instant...Then so distant the next.  we both never saw anything like this and have been searching for other sightings on-line since last night.
content.summary: Bright magenta/red light in the sky which was round and got very bright in the middle- seemed close then.....

content.detailedDescription: On the morning of dec. 29th 2010 at 5:50am i was awoken by a noise that sounded like it came from the kitchen.  no one else was home at the time.  i live in a ranch with the bedrooms on the far side of the house from the kitchen the kitchen faces toward the rear of the house.  the noise sounded like a low hum that a high voltage transformer makes under load.  i am an electrician so i have heard this sound numerous times.  i got up and went over towards the kitchen expecting to find a cell phone or pager vibrating.  the sound appeared to becoming from the counter area next to the sink.  i checked the top of the counter and there were no devices operating that would make such a sound.  i checked in the drawers below the counter and found nothing.  the sound was a contiuous hum varing in intensity over a couple of seconds.  it was sable and non varying in pitch. i went down into the basement where there is a crawl space directly under the kitchen.  the sound was not noticed in the basement.  this led me to believe that the noise was external to the house.  i live in a development with under ground utilities, there are no transformers hanging from poles in the egress between the houses.  the nearest transformer is located across the street and is pad mounted.  if the noise had been coming from that direction i would have heard it in the living room which i did not.  after concluding that the noise was external to the house i went to the window which is about three feet from the location of the noise and over the kitchen sink.  as soon as i touched the curtains over the window the noise stopped.  i became frightened and retreated into the living room, i did not have the presence of mind to look outside.  the next day at approximately the same time in the morning i heard a large double bladed helocopter pass over the house.  i was in the military and am familar with the sound of these types of helecopters.  this is unusual but has happened before as they pass over a couple of times a year, usually during the day.  i would be interested to know if anyone else saw or heard anything during that time period or if what i have discribed has ever been heard by anyone else.
content.summary: Rythmic sound

content.detailedDescription: I was walking out from my buddies apt along with his brother. as we waited for the buddie who's appartment we were at in the front(downtown long beach), something caught my attention from the corner of my eye. i then noticed a small cluster of dimly lit lights crossing the sky probably 200-400 feet in the air moving slowly and gracefully. i then asked the brother who was outside with me waiting to look at these objects, at first glance he thought it was an airplane naturally, but after getting a good glance at what was a very clear and easily identifiable view we both saw four separate orbs or balls of light moving slowly twards the beach. i attempted to yell out his brothers name so that he too could witness what we were absolutely amazed by, during my attempts to call him out we kept our eyes locked on the four lights and they suddenly began to sort of like dance around eachother while still heading west twards the ocean. these objects were in our sight for a good minute maybe untill the buildings in the horizon took them out of our sight, but before they were no longer in our vision they manuvered around eachother in circular and zig zagish patterns, giving me the sense that these werent aircraft because they almost seemed alive by the way they just glid around eachother very softly. i admit the encounter left me totally perplexed. it happened in a highly populated city at the peak hour when social events bring everyone out from city to the streets. and because of the soft light they gave off clearly visable to the naked eye but not so bright as to be an immideate attention grabber i now truly ponder just how frequently they traverse our sky's like they did on this extraordinary night in long beach california.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 4 dimly lit orbs traveled in sync for 10sec and the separated as they danced around in a noiseless flight.

content.detailedDescription: I left my house to take a short drive to our local walmart gas station. its was a very clear and dark night. i was driving on a country road. no street lights at all on this stretch of road. im very observant when im driving at night because we do have a lot of deer running around here and im always extra careful so i dont have a run-in with one. out of the sky, directly in front of me i saw a bright lime green sphere. i thought maybe it was a helicopter, airplane or search light. we are military and live near the ft. hood army installation base. so we always have some type of training going on and all types of aircraft flying around. i couldnt help but notice it. but there was no sound at all and no lights hitting the ground. it hovered, zig and zagged, took off and disappeared. it was a perfect circle. like a marble enclosed in a cloud. as it flew away it had a tail which made it look like a teardrop with the cloudy green color making it look like its firey exhaust, and then it just disappeared. im a vet and i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me. but i know what i saw last night and i will never forget it. it came in silently and left the same way. at least i know that im not alone and others saw and experienced the same thing last night here in texas. i kept driving, went to the store and came home as fast as i could. i talked to my brother who is a cop and he told me to report it on this site. if i ever have another situation like this, i hope i have a camera to show proof of what my eyes have encountered.
content.summary: I saw a  bright , lime-green, circular  object just appear silently out of the sky. it looked like it was searching for something and i thought it was a search light at first.. it hovere, zigged and zagged and then continued moving until it just vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting by my pool facing the east playing my flute. it was a warm evening with good visablity. while i was playing my flute, all of a sudden i saw in the corner of my eye a bright white light coming in to my view from the southeast part of the sky. i stopped playing and watched as this bright white globe streamed across the sky from right to left, (southeast to north), desending from right to left at about a 40 degree angle towards the ground. it was very close, not far away. i did'nt know what it could be. i really didn't have time to think about it, it happened really fast. it looked like it was just above the greenbelt behind my house. it appeared like the full moon, yet it was at least twice as large as a full moon. also, the moon was behind me and was only partially lit, maybe a 3rd of the moon was lit. so it definitly wasn't the moon. it almost seemed like it was just east of the house next to me, maybe a little further, maybe a 2-4 hundred yards, where there is a green belt that separates our houses from the apartments that are on the top of the hill. as it streamed across the sky, after about 2 seconds it produced two little white flare like jets of fire one on the top and one on the bottom of the globe. the globe then started spinning in a clockwise motion while it was descending. this lasted about 3 or 4 seconds. then, it fell towards the ground. when it was about to hit the ground i screamed stood up and screamed " oh my god ", as i expected to hear a large explosion. but it went behind the trees and dissappeared with no sound. i looked at my watch and it read 10:35 pm cst. i want to repeat that this globe was large and moving very fast from left to right at a 40 degree angle downwards. it wasn't the moon, it wasn't an airplane or helicopter. 
i've never seen a ufo before,and i never expected i would ever see something like this. it's the most incredible thing i've ever seen in my life. in regards to my feelings, i started thinking about the events that are happening around the world. in japan, new zealand, and the volcanoe in indoensia erupting. i started becoming concerned that this was a sign or a warning. i was worried that more was about to happen, but it didn't. at least not last night. these were just my feelings. the experience was very intense and i still have so many questions. that's really all i can convey at this time.
content.summary: Moon like globe shoots across the sky from left to right

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 11:35 pm march 12 2011, i came out side to look at the stars and give my dog her massage before bed, i looked up in the se sky over powdery, texas,just e of hwy 271 and i saw what i thought was going to be a shooting star or meteroit as it had a much larger tail behind it. it traved horizontally across the sky with no decention.. i was quite intrigued as to what happened next. a very large brilliant bright green a fireball like sphere appeared in front of the tail. it remained there traveling hoizontally for a few more moments,15-20 seconds and just disappearred tail and all! there was no fading just gone. the whole event encompassed approx.45seconds. the .Very large size of the object made the stars appear to be tiny crystals far in the distance. i was awe struck andfound myself repeating " oh my gosh what is that?" i immediatly ran inside and told my mother what id witnessed.  
 i ve always watched the stars since i was a child and have seen many beautiful things but never anything quite so faboulous and so close.
content.summary: Huge! brilliant- green sphere shaped fireball with large comet-like tail

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in the hot tub. i bring binoulars with me as i like to skywatch. i also had my little camera with a 3x zoom. the sky was very clear.
i switched spots in the hot tub, and looked up while moving and some very small objects caught my eyes. i thought there were so many and up so very high...Not hot air balloons. moving unlike other air vehicles, so did not seem to be planes or groups of balloons. grabbed the binoculars. counted 12 objects, all in the same area; a grouping. they were moving slowly, in the north/nne sky towards the south. i could see 4 at once with binoculars. using the binoculars, they each looked like 3 cigar shapes, all the same size, attached by something invisible, and changing orientation...With some blue sky in between them. they also, i could see with the bino's,  were amber/orange color and looked vivid and kind of "lit up". at this point, i had to get out of the hot tub and find my brand new video camera, that i was unfamiliar with since i just got it the day before. no tripod either. so i "wung it" and gave it my best. i was able to see them with my eyes, was more difficult to find them with the camera and the 78x zoom. i finally located one, and stayed with it until i moved the wrong way and lost it. it looked totally different with the video on 78x. now it appeared to be a cluster of balloon type things. i think all 12 objects were the same or similar. the "balloons" appeared to be stressed, sort of morphing. i did not have tripod so video is shaky. the objects were not shaking. they were "gliding slowly in a group". i got about 2 minutes on video. then my husband came home, i lost the image and we watched a little longer with the bino's and naked eyes, took a couple photos with the 3x zoom...Then they they all faded away and were gone.
it was very exciting, i was nervous while getting video..I was very anxious, and when it was over i wanted to see it again! wished i had more practice with my camera before this event but was so very glad i caught it on video.
content.summary: Sitting outside in spa, small objects high in sky caught my eyes. 12 amber lighted objects were moving slowly. got video.

content.detailedDescription:
2 separate lights  1 disappear 2nd slow dim to dark could see it curve upward vanish 
there was a low hush slow overhead than 1 disapears continue slow
2nd light disapears but see craft curve upward away from me, round in shape  probly 1000ft up, craft looked to be no more than 50ft across..
content.summary: 2 separate lights  1 disappear 2nd slow dim to dark could see it curve upward vanish

content.detailedDescription: I was playing a video game on the computer and happen to look out the window(which had blinds over the window). i saw a a 3/4 size of moon white maybe blueish orb in the sky that first looked like a meteor but it left no trail. this took much surprise to me. i saw whatever short amount of time i had until it was gone. i was calm for a little while but soon i felt like i was about to have an anxiety attack. it move straight across the sky maybe a little bit of turning. it just flew away the next half second.
content.summary: A 3/4 size of moon white maybe blueish orb in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog tonight at 2240 and since it was a beautiful clear night i was looking up at the stars.  out of nowhere, where there had been only stars, a green light appeared and just hovered in the sky. it was a solid green light that had an almost neon-like glowing quality to it -  but it was definately a solid green light that did not change it's shape while it hovered.  just as i saw the light, as it was standing still, it shot off amazingly fast leaving a white tail behind and then the light and the white tail just disappeared.  as the light was jetting off it changed into a short imperfect cylinder shape like it was stretching and a large white tail was left behind as it moved. the green light moved straight then curved slightly upward and then disappeared along with the bright white tail.  i did not hear any noise at all - it simply appeared in a clear sky and i felt as if this object was low in the sky but i don't know what makes me think that since the event lasted just seconds.  i have seen many shooting stars and this was an object that was not dependent on gravity for movement - this object moved under it's own power.  i am not someone who looks for ufo's as my thinking is if they are intelligent enough to visit us they are intelligent enough to not be seen.  awesome experience and one i will never forget.
content.summary: Green shape appeared out of nowhere then shot away up to clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on rt 3 in lowell ma to get to 495 south. while on the highway i noticed 5 spherical objects drifting in formation. i remember thinking that they looked like balls of fire because they were a bright burning orange and yellow color. however, they appeared to be perfect spheres. i pulled over on the highway and snapped a quick photo on my phone. unfortunately my camera could not zoom and it just looks like dots in the sky. i took the next exit and pulled into a parking lot. this was  at 8:02 pm judging by a phone call i made during this sighting. by this time there were only 2 in the sky. one at a time, they slowly decreased in size until they were no longer visible. it did not look like they were moving further away, but rather like they were fading. which also made me qeustion whether or not this was something on fire, and slowly going out. that is the best way to explain how they were fading. i drove away to get back on the highway and then i look up and see that all 5 are back in the same formation that they were before. i pulled into a closed gas station to get a better look. next door was a mcdonalds which had several customers outside looking and filming the objects. we all stayed, staring and discussing what we were seeing until they all faded away again. we stayed a few minutes to see if they would reappear, but they did not.  i have checked youtube in hopes of finding someone who has posted a video, but have not found anything on this date. using my best judgement and logic, i cannot begin to suggest a plausible explanation of what these objects were. i have never seen anything like this before. (nor had the other people who were standing outside the mcdonalds). it may also be important to note that after the incident it became extremely foggy. it was also a fairly cloudy night, so these objects were definitely under clouds. it is hard to judge their height  any reference points, but my best guess would be 100-200 ft. above ground. they were drifting very slowly together. they were sporadically aligned, not in a strict formation, but drifting at the exact same speed without changing their relative positions. i hope this dictation is clear enough.
content.summary: 4-5 bright spherical objects drifting 100-200ft over lowell ma
